definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The gold and gold alloy hydride migrate to shallow regions of the crust.
sentences.chinese: 金及金合金氢化物迁移至地壳浅部。

sentences.english: Xanthone was reduced to xanthydrol by sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 用硼氢化钠对呫吨酮还原得到呫吨醇。

sentences.english: A typical example is the halogenation of a hydrocarbon.
sentences.chinese: 典型的例子是碳氢化合物的卤化。

sentences.english: An unsaturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkene homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 不饱和碳氢化合物，属于烯烃同系物。

sentences.english: Weinreb amide can easily be reduced to aldehyde by metal hydride.
sentences.chinese: Weinreb酰胺也易于被金属氢化物还原为醛。

sentences.english: It is a saturated hydrocarbon belonging to the alkane homologous series.
sentences.chinese: 是饱和碳氢化合物，属于烷烃同系物。

sentences.english: Different fullerene hydrides were prepared using different synthetic methodologies. Fullerene hydrides might be a potential hydrogen storage material.
sentences.chinese: 并对富勒烯氢化物在储氢材料方面的应用作了展望。

sentences.english: The hydrides are then decomposed in a low-temperature flame .
sentences.chinese: 然后氢化物在低温火焰中分解。

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物对金属钾的氢化反应不显示催化作用。

sentences.english: The Synthesis technology and application of sodium borohydride at home and abroad have been described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论述了国内外硼氢化钠的合成工艺及该产品的应用。

sentences.english: A large number of hydrocarbons such as benzopyrene are also mutagenic.
sentences.chinese: 大量碳氢化合物如苯并芘也是诱变剂。

sentences.english: Hydrogenated Trans Fat or Healing Coconut Oil?
sentences.chinese: 氢化反式脂肪或愈合椰子油？

sentences.english: Because it is so stable, it can be used in cooking without becoming hydrogenated .
sentences.chinese: 因为它是那么稳定，可用于烹调成无氢化。

sentences.english: It is resistant to borohydride reduction in alcoholic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 在醇溶剂中，它不能被硼氢化物还原。

sentences.english: Diesel is made up of hydrocarbons with roughly 12 to 24 carbons.
sentences.chinese: 柴油是由大约12到24个碳的碳氢化合物组成。

sentences.english: Sodium metaborate is a by-product from deoxidation of sodium borohydride.
sentences.chinese: 偏硼酸钠是硼氢化钠的还原副产物。
